title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
writer: Henry Gayden, Chris Morgan, Bill Parker
short_cast: Zachary Levi, Rachel Zegler, Helen Mirren, Lucy Liu, Adam Brody, Asher Angel, Jack Dylan Grazer, Ross Butler, D.J. Cotrona, Grace Caroline Currey, Meagan Good, Djimon Hounsou

desc: When vengeful gods threaten to seize Shazam's powers, it's up to wisecracking Billy Batson to keep his superhero siblings together and save the world.
